// double
 0 01111111110 0000000000000000000000110000000000000000000000000000
            0.1000000000000000000000010111111111111111111111111111111
            0.1000000000000000000000011

// double -> float
0 011 11111110 0000000000000000000000110000000000000000000000000000
0 000 01111110 0000000000000000000000100000000000000000000000000000

d =         0.1000000000000000000000011
f =         0.100000000000000000000001
fd =        0.10000000000000000000001
